hero.title: Empowering Through AI Education
hero.subtitle: Making artificial intelligence accessible and understandable for everyone

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Empowering individuals with the knowledge and tools to understand and harness AI technology

tech.title: Technology for Everyone
tech.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive resources and tools to make AI accessible and understandable

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: In a world of rapid technological advancement, we are more than just an organization - we are a movement. We support people not only in understanding technology but in actively and ethically shaping it for a better future.
